name: Stinger (V)
Lore: 'Constructed by a secretive Surronian hive craftguild. Equipped with H2-1 hyperdrive system and emergency braking jets. Guri''s personal starship. Gift from Prince Xizor.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot. Guri deploys -3 aboard. While Guri piloting, during any control phase may draw top card of Reserve Deck (if Leia or Chewie on table, Force Pile instead) and immune to attrition < 5.(Original concept by Michael Bahr - PC Volunteer Award 2006)',
